DOC.brief_summary: To provide elotuzumab treatment single-patient use .
DOC.brief_title: Expanded Access Single Named Patient Program With Elotuzumab ( BMS-901608 ) Treatment Patient R-A With Relapsed/Refractory Multiple Myeloma
